abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Road Transport
            Project is to stimulate higher economic growth by reducing
            road transport costs in the borrower's territory. The
            closing date of the project will be extended by 12 months
            from May 31, 2012 until May 30, 2013. Extension of the
            closing date will enable the achievement of 100 percent of
            the project's physical targets. The extended timeframe
            will also allow completing the key ongoing strategic
            technical assistance activities, which are in various stages
            of execution. This third extension will enable to more fully
            achieve the project's development objective by ensuring
            a continued support for the institutional strengthening
            component of the project. The extended timeframe will also
            allow completing the key ongoing strategic technical
            assistance activities, which are in various stages of
            execution. The current project development objective and
            result indicators continue to be achievable and will be
            enhanced with the extension of the closing date.
